course_info.Course Title: Creating Stunning Digital Graphics with Canva
Learning Outcomes: LO1: Develop visual communication projects in Canva, blending typography with media elements.
LO2: Create Canva storyboards to communicate visual intention to team members and evaluate designs to suggest visual enhancements.
LO3: Develop strategies for Canva designs, critiquing and collaborating to improve visual communication based on best practices.

analyst_responses.What are the performance gaps in the ind: The industry faces challenges with the application of innovative design strategies and the effective use of design software. Many professionals are not familiar with the advanced features available in design tools, which limits their ability to create visually appealing and impactful designs. This lack of knowledge can stifle creativity and hinder the development of unique visual solutions.
analyst_responses.Why do you think this WSQ course will ad: This course focuses on innovative approaches to design, encouraging participants to explore advanced features in Canva. By developing strategies to enhance visual communication, learners will be better equipped to create distinctive designs that stand out in a competitive market.
